title: John & Lisa's Food Trip Down Under
overview: ITV's hugely popular culinary couple John Torode and Lisa Faulkner are set to embark on a journey of a lifetime that will see the pair travel 500 miles along the beautiful coast of Western Australia, in search of the very best local food and wine for John & Lisa's Food Trip Down Under.Proud Australian chef John Torode will travel with his wife, actress and home cook, Lisa Faulkner along a gourmet route of discovery as he returns to the place where his passion for food and cooking began. There they'll seek out chefs, food fanatics and entrepreneurs creating incredible produce in new ways, from black truffles to abalone. They'll meet established winemakers and experience some of Western Australia's most beautiful landscapes.
